0.6.name: wordpress/banner-generator
0.6.description:
Banner generator generates a banner with your blog's name and the title of your last post.

Style is completely customizable. You can change text font, size, color and position, background color, border and round corners or use your own background image. Now you can even use your own logo instead of a blog title.

http://blog.hamsworld.net/2009/06/06/wordpress-plugin-banner-generator-2/

0.6.4 version fixed default upload folder path.
